p: Organosulfur compounds are found in the plants of the Allium genus such as onions ( e.g. Allium cepa), and garlic ( Allium sativum). In a recent in silico study, the organosulfur materials such as allyl disulfide and allyl trisulfide from Allium sativum showed significant potential in binding to human ACE2, the target of SARS-CoV-2 (Thuy et al., 2020).
